name: Kryno, the robot
description:
Game made for #WeeklyGameJam 148 

Not great, not terrible, but is my first game I ever done. My first gamejam and I'm proud of what I done :)

You need to help a robot named Kryno, to destroy all the mirrors because he hate to see his robo-face 

Hope you like it. Leave a comment if you do.. and if you don't. Every comment is welcome <3 

Instructions:

1. Download the zip file

2. Unzip

3. Play from the exe file.
